column5: Congratulations!
Congrats
Congrats Mike to you and your family.
Wow, Very Cool! Congrats, Congrats Mike!             Gettin' any sleep?  Ric
Congratulations Mike ! hope your little one bring yo lots of joy!

Thanks all, it's been great, even with the loss of sleep these first few months and the fact I haven't been fishing since August.  Hopefully will get a chance to get out for a few hours at least in the spring.  Mike
Congrats Mike  Maybe future Muskie man !  TB
....Congratualations Mike, I'm sure you're loving being a Dad.

There isn't anything like it in the world. Everyone tells me not that it goes by too quickly, but I can't wait to get him his first rod (he got a toy plastic one this Christmas) and start teaching him how to fish.  Mike

Being a Dad is great!  We are just starting to get normal sleep again.  Funny thing happened the other day. The garbage collector refused to take our garbage because the diapers caused the container to weigh a ton.  Congrats!
Congrats...  Definitely a PB!!

Hi guys,  Been quiet for the past few months as I have been really busy with work and with taking care of my son, our first, who we've named Oliver.    He already got his first (toy) fishing rod at Christmas, and he seems to like watching fishing shows with his dad. I think he's a bass guy because he doesn't seem too interested if the show's about other species, but if smallies or largemouth are getting caught, he starts paying attention.  Can't wait until I can get him out for some panfish off the cottage dock.  Looking forward to catching up on OFC and making some posts once in a while.  Happy belated new year to all,  Mike
Hey Mike!!! I was wondering where you went!  Congrats on your first....he looks like he'll be a natural fishing partner for you.  This is great news...and thanks for coming back to share it!
Congrats, Mike, on the wee lad ! Good to see you back....
Hey Mike,  That's a great picture!!! Congrats on your new addition!!!

Hmmm, deciding on species already at his age...???  Congratulations on your son... you will find so many moments of joy... to bad they can't stay little forever!  Look forward to all your posts!  Cheers,  Jen
Great pic Mike! Congrats, sounds like you're off to a great start. Happy New Year!
Wow, congrats Mike.  What a little sweetie  Joey

Congrats, definitely a keeper. And a Bass man to boot, what could be better ?  Hope you have a handle on his education expenses cuz' all his dough will be blown on tackle. But at least then he can take the old man out fishing   Hookset.

Wow great news Mike I was wondering where you went to.Congrats on your first child  Great to have a sone my 2 Daughters 11 and 13 have given up on fishing  So glad we made my boy during the ice storm in 98.What would I do without him he loves fishing more than me.
CONGRATS MIKE.  Good looking little man ya got there.
MTP, when you figure out how to catch 'em you'll love fishing as much as he does!  Congrats Mike on your new addition. I think Oli has his eyes on a cute waitress! -Brian
Congrats Mike!  He's a cutie!  maureen
Congtratulations Mike, that's the best gift you'll ever receive !!
Congrats on that PB Mike!!!  Now you are the one that's hooked!
Congrats Mike!
Well Mike thats great, congrats. Let me know when you are up at the lake this season. We can rig up a seat for Oliver in my boat (so he can out fish us)...  Bill.
Congrats Mike.
WOW man! congrats to you and the wife! What a a cute little tiger!  G
AWESOME! Congrats! HH
that's great
Congrats Mike and happy belated New Year to you too.
Great catch Mike! Congrats!
"hey" hes a keeper  ,looks like a future fishermen to me  . enjoy every minute they grow up fast  Hawg Hunter
Awesome, there's nothing better!  Charles
Awesome news! Congrats to you and the Miss's on your new bundle of joy.  Cheers, 1leg
